itemDescription: Bark, Evelyn Elizabeth Patricia (1900–1993), charity worker

wikipedia_page.main: Evelyn Elizabeth Patricia Bark,   (1900 - 1993) was a leading member of the British Red Cross.

response: *1900 – Evelyn Bark, leading member of the British Red Cross, first female recipient of the CMG (d. 1993)
* December 26 – Evelyn Bark, leading member of the British Red Cross, first female recipient of the CMG (d. 1993)

link_mentions.page: Order of St Michael and St George
response: In 1965 the order was opened to women, with Evelyn Bark becoming the first female CMG in 1967.
Evelyn Bark, article in The Independent
* 26 December – Evelyn Bark, humanitarian, leading member of the Red Cross, first female recipient of the CMG (died 1993)
